Notes: 0-8 = None, up, up-right, right, etc CW
Up, right, down, left are the buttons, but supports combinations. E.g. up-right, down-left but not up-down, or left-right for example.

Encoder pulses, forward (Bit 57) and backward (Bit 58). A 1 then 0 on the same bit corresponds to one tick.
